message: OpenAPI spec must define at least one server in the 'servers' array.
Security scheme 'access_token' is defined in components.securitySchemes but not used in any security requirement.
{'type': 'http', 'scheme': 'bearer', 'bearerFormat': None} is not valid under any of the given schemas
